PLACEHOLDER - Social Preview Image for GitHub Repository

Recommended size: 1280x640 pixels

This image will appear when sharing the repository link on social media.

Suggested content:
- SpotSaver logo/icon
- Tagline: "Find Your Car. Beat the Clock."
- App screenshot or mockup
- Clean, professional design with brand colors (dark blue #001A33, green #00C853)

To set this as your repository's social preview:
1. Go to repository Settings on GitHub
2. Scroll to "Social preview"
3. Upload this image (1280x640px)

You can create this image using:
- Canva (canva.com)
- Figma (figma.com)
- Adobe Photoshop
- Any graphic design tool
